mapper.insert: insert into task (id, user_id, item_id, leader_id, "security level", create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{securityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update task set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leader_id = #{leaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "security level" = #{securityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, item_id, leader_id, "security level", create_time, update_time from task
